description.value:
Duella watches over the people of Hucaen as they sleep and dream. The Dream Dweller is not to be trifled with, however - she can just as easily give nightmares as peaceful sleep. Some say the stars in the sky are individual dreams.

Edicts always make time for sleeping and dreams, ensure others never go to sleep scared

Anathema stay up all night without any breaks for sleeping or dreaming, attack a person or creature while they sleep

Areas of Concern dreams, stars, freedom, nightmares

publication.title: Player's Guide to Hucaen 1107: Foundry Edition
publication.author: Cornelius
